data.meta_site_name: FINE ARTS WORK CENTER in Provincetown
data.text:
24PearlStreet Workshops and Events

Sean Singer Revision & Possibility – LIVE Poetry February 19 to February 23, 2024 Number of Participants: 12 Price: $575.00 Format: 1 Week - LIVE Zoom Workshop

LIVE via ZOOM: 1pm-3pm (Eastern Time)

The Spanish poet Juan Ramón Jiménez believed that we can never revise our lives, but revision opens the possibility to improve any piece of writing.

This workshop will focus on specific revision skills and insights such as: Surprise your work, Revise part of your work—but remember the whole, Correction as sometimes only confirmation, Respect the person you were, Respect the defect that cannot be conquered, Looking at drafts and final versions of poems by well-known poets, Extending the poetry practice into practical life.

Biography
